did.unittitle: Quotation from "Domestic Life" by Richard Henry Dana Sr.

scopecontent.p: [See ALS 1852 Jul 30 Richard Henry Dana Sr.to George Palmer Putnam. ]

did.unittitle: "The Buccaneer," 2 verses, by Richard Henry Dana Sr.
Richard Henry Dana Sr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Encloses quotation from his "Domestic Life" that Putnam wanted.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Jr.to Rev. R. Anderson

scopecontent.p: [Thanks him for his book on the Hawaiian Islands, which included a letter from Dana Jr. to Anderson; mentions charm of Hawaiian Islands, press of business and politics; includes discussion of the Chicagoplatform.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Sr.to Richard Henry Dana III

scopecontent.p: [Sending periodicals to him in Manchester; hopes Dana III's friend Sanger will join him; Dana Sr. not going to Cape Annat present because he is expecting Mr. Corbyn.]
